channel.title: Can someone help explain this to me
channel.description:
Automatic Renewal Authorization: Enjoy your favorites with the first year already paid for by XEOS. The credit/debit card you provide will be charged just $2 each for processing. * If you selected Time, Entertainment Weekly, Sports Illustrated, National Geographic Adventure, Food & Wine, National Geographic Traveler, Fortune, Travel + Leisure, Money, The Atlantic, Real Simple, Entrepreneur, Fast Company, Essence, Inc, Health, Parents, Rolling Stone, Men's Journal, Town and Country, Harper's Bazaar, BusinessWeek and/or O, The Oprah Magazine each selection is just $2 for a full year of issues, and no p/h applies. After the first term, all selections will continue. [b]Each year, you'll receive a reminder notice and you authorize the account you provided to be charged the rate on the notice for the next year of issues unless you choose to cancel: 1-800-429-2550.[/b] The name, address, email and account information you provide will be collected by SynapseConnect to process and fulfill your selections. Please print a copy of this page for your records. For individual use only, not for resale. Enjoy!
What does the bolded mean. They are going to bill me if I say I want to continue the subscription or Does it mean that unless I cancel that will automatically bill me.

item.title: Can someone help explain this to me
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Uh, its pretty clear.

“Unless you cancel, your account will AUTOMATICALLY be re-charged for the next year unless you call the number provided, you will be reminded at some point beforehand”

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help explain this to me

item.title: Can someone help explain this to me
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

T4_:

Beware though, poorly written information such as that indicates the site is usually up to no good.

I’ve had bad experiences that can back this up

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help explain this to me

item.title: Can someone help explain this to me
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

It means they will contact you when your account is up for renewal and it will auto-charge and continue being active. Else, you can cancel.

I just edited my post, I looked around and found the new above statement is correct. Beware though, poorly written information such as that indicates the site is usually up to no good.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help explain this to me

item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

Automatic Renewal Authorization: Enjoy your favorites with the first year already paid for by XEOS. The credit/debit card you provide will be charged just $2 each for processing.
  • If you selected Time, Entertainment Weekly, Sports Illustrated, National Geographic Adventure, Food & Wine, National Geographic Traveler, Fortune, Travel + Leisure, Money, The Atlantic, Real Simple, Entrepreneur, Fast Company, Essence, Inc, Health, Parents, Rolling Stone, Men’s Journal, Town and Country, Harper’s Bazaar, BusinessWeek and/or O, The Oprah Magazine each selection is just $2 for a full year of issues, and no p/h applies.

After the first term, all selections will continue. Each year, you’ll receive a reminder notice and you authorize the account you provided to be charged the rate on the notice for the next year of issues unless you choose to cancel: 1-800-429-2550. The name, address, email and account information you provide will be collected by SynapseConnect to process and fulfill your selections. Please print a copy of this page for your records. For individual use only, not for resale. Enjoy!

What does the bolded mean. They are going to bill me if I say I want to continue the subscription

or

Does it mean that unless I cancel that will automatically bill me.
